name: GDNeko
description: Brings the ancient screen pet to GD

layers-title.name: Layers
layers-title.description: Here you can set the screens you don't want Neko to be in (they are all activated by default)

levelbrowserlayer.name: LevelBrowserLayer
levelbrowserlayer.description: The menu where you can select online levels to play

levelsearchlayer.name: Level Search
levelsearchlayer.description: The menu where you set up the filters for your search

creatorlayer.name: CreatorLayer
creatorlayer.description: The menu where you can open the daily level, weekly demon, quests or paths popup

levelinfolayer.name: Level Info Page
levelinfolayer.description: The menu where you can play the level, download the song and open the comments

editlevellayer.name: Editor Level Page
editlevellayer.description: The menu where your can play and upload your level
